scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: These records are part of Auditor of Public Accounts. Disbursements to Localities and Individuals: Local Government Expenses - Militia. This series consists of printed general orders concerning uniforms and requiring certification that militia units are properly uniformed before arms are issued. The orders prescribe the proper uniform for artillery, cavalry, infantry, and riflemen.
